channel.title: Star of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the star of the day.

item.title: Star Star
item.description: "Star Star" (originally titled "Starfucker") is a song recorded by the English rock band the Rolling Stones. It was written by Mick Jagger and Keith Richards. In a few select countries, the song was released as a single from the band's album Goats Head Soup (1973), with "Doo Doo Doo Doo Doo (Heartbreaker)" as its B-side. The song's title was changed to "Star Star" from "Starfucker" after Ahmet Erteg√ºn of Atlantic Records insisted on the change.
